title: Ane compendious and breue tractate, concernyng ye office and dewtie of kyngis, spirituall pastoris, and temporall iugis laitlie compylit be William Lauder. For the faithfull instructioun of kyngis, and prencis
author: Lauder, William, 1520?-1573.
publicationStmtDate: In the zeir of God ane M.V.C.LUI. [sic, i.e. 1556]
